title: WTB T206 Stahl (Both Poses) & Wagner (Bat on Right Shoulder)
author: wolf441

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Stahl (Both Poses) & Wagner (Bat on Right Shoulder)
posts.post_content: Picked up both Stahl versions (thanks to Sterling Auctions and Net54 member Buffettfan!!). Now I just need a lower grade/raw Wagner bat on right shoulder to complete my T206 Boston American sub-set.  Any help would be greatly appreciated!
